thread.title: Gem in a lovely location
thread.title_full: Gem in a lovely location - Review of Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Beachbound746
title: Gem in a lovely location
text: I've stayed at the Hotel Odeon Saint-Germain many times now. I love the warm, cozy ambiance of this gem of a hotel. The staff is extremely pleasant and helpful. The neighborhood is lovely--fairly quiet street and many great little places to eat and shop. Several excellent, highly acclaimed pastry shops/chocolatiers/wine bars are within a minute or two walk. I feel like I've arrived at a friend's home to stay each time I arrive at Hotel Odeon SG.
